summary: Roblox is an online gaming platform where people can create and play games made by users. It was made in 2006 by David Baszucki and Erik Cassel. Players can make games using a programming language called Lua. Roblox became very popular in the 2010s, especially during the COVID-19 pandemic. Anyone can play for free, but there are optional in-game purchases using a virtual currency called Robux. As of 2020, millions of people play Roblox each month, and it's especially popular among American kids under 16.
title: Roblox
